description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) exploited CVE-2020-10189 against Zoho ManageEngine Desktop Central through unsafe deserialization, and CVE-2019-19781 to compromise Citrix Application Delivery Controllers (ADC) and gateway devices.(Citation: FireEye APT41 March 2020) [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) leveraged vulnerabilities such as ProxyLogon exploitation or SQL injection for initial access.(Citation: Rostovcev APT41 2021) [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) exploited CVE-2021-26855 against a vulnerable Microsoft Exchange Server to gain initial access to the victim network.(Citation: apt41_dcsocytec_dec2022)
